column4: hello all can anyone tell me where i can find libva-dev for intrepid
do you mean libvala-dev?
because there's no libva-dev
no vaapi-dev either. what are you trying to do?
trying to get on video card processing support for my nvidia card so I can offload mpeg processing from the cpu
VA-API
isn't that really new? the only page i can find is https://wiki.ubuntu.com/mobile-hw-decode
yes
the page says its going to be implemented. so you'll just have to wait :(
are the programs you're trying to use with VA-API actually compiled with support for that?
yes they are the beta invidia driver contains the ability to use it
are you writing your own program or are you using a media player/encoder?
the thing is does ubuntu have the newest mplayer with support for va-api
surely they would include libva in the repositories if mplayer depended on it
no, you can't do that easily
not easily
well no
you could try and install it again
this time logging the files it adds
oh i see you're trying to get that va-api thing working
apt-get?
in that case you can just reinstall mplayer
unless when you did make install it installed to /usr/local
sorry looking perhaps i could use build-dep
